channel.title: Add funpkzone fight pits?
channel.description: How do I add fun pkzone fight pits? Like if you die, you respawn at the entrance, and you don't lose anything....

item.title: Add funpkzone fight pits?
item.dc:creator: @barrage_pker barrage pker
item.description:
@barrage_pker wrote:

well dunno if this will work but go client.java search for applydead tillu coem tro applydead{} or summit…then underneath b4 the 3brackets add this
if ((absY <= yyyy && absY >= yyyy && absX <= xxxx && absX >= xxxx))

replace yyyy with the coords where u want to stay alive and xxxx the same dunno if itll work if it gives errors just remove it

Read full topic
